747:         private
748:     {
749:         
750:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
751: 
752:         
753:         uint256 _now = now;
754: 
755:

757:         {

762:

765: 
766:

768:

770:             _eventData_ = endRound(_eventData_);
771:

774:             _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + _pID;
775:

797:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, POHMODATASETS.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
798:         private
799:     {
800:         
801:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
802:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
803: 
804:         
805:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 5000000000000000000)
806:         {
807:             uint256 _availableLimit = (5000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
808:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
809:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
810:             _eth = _availableLimit;
811:         }
812: 
813:         
814:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
815:         {
816: 
817:             
818:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
819: 
820:             
821:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
822:             {
823:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
824: 
825:             
826:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
827:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
828:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
829:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
830: 
831:             
832:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
833:         }
834: 
835:             
836:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
837:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
838: 
839:             
840:             round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
841:             round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
842:             rndTmEth_[_rID][0] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][0]);
843: 
844:             
845:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, 0, _eventData_);
846:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, 0, _keys, _eventData_);
847: 
848:             
849:             endTx(_pID, 0, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
850:         }
851:     }

input:
find all Reentrancy vulnerabilities and detect vulnerable line numbers from the contract as well as vulnerableCode, vulnerabilityReason, potentialSecurityRisk, and fixedCode based on the instruction.

1: contract StepFunction {
2:   uint public phaseLength;
3:   uint public nSteps;
4:   uint public step;
5: 
6:   function StepFunction(uint _phaseLength, uint _initialValue, uint _nSteps) {
7:     // Throw if phaseLength does not leave enough room for number of steps
8:     if (_nSteps > _phaseLength) { throw; } 
9:   
10:     // The reduction in value per step 
11:     step = _initialValue / _nSteps;
12:     
13:     // Throw if _initialValue was not divisible by _nSteps
14:     if ( step * _nSteps != _initialValue) { throw; } 
15: 
16:     phaseLength = _phaseLength;
17:     nSteps = _nSteps; 
18:   }
19:  
20:   /*
21:    * Note the following edge cases.
22:    *   initialValue = 0: is valid and will create the constant zero function
23:    *   nSteps = 0: is valid and will create the constant zero function (only 1
24:    *   sub-interval)
25:    *   phaseLength < nSteps: is valid, but unlikely to be intended (so the
26:    *   constructor throws)
27:    */
28:   
29:   /**
30:    * Evaluate the step function at a given time  
31:    *
32:    * elapsedTime MUST be in the intervall [0,phaseLength)
33:    * The return value is between initialValue and 0, never negative.
34:    */
35:   function getStepFunction(uint elapsedTime) constant returns (uint) {
36:     // Throw is elapsedTime is out-of-range
37:     if (elapsedTime >= phaseLength) { throw; }
38:     
39:     // The function value will bel calculated from the end value backwards.
40:     // Hence we need the time left, which will lie in the intervall
41:     // [0,phaseLength)
42:     uint timeLeft  = phaseLength - elapsedTime - 1; 
43: 
44:     // Calculate the number of steps away from reaching end value
45:     // When verifying the forumla below it may help to note:
46:     //   at elapsedTime = 0 stepsLeft evaluates to nSteps,
47:     //   at elapsedTime = -1 stepsLeft would evaluate to nSteps + 1.
48:     uint stepsLeft = ((nSteps + 1) * timeLeft) / phaseLength; 
49: 
50:     // Apply the step function
51:     return stepsLeft * step;
52:   }
53: }

889:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
890:         private
891:     {
892:         
893:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
894:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
895:         
896:         
897:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 1000000000000000000)
898:         {
899:             uint256 _availableLimit = (1000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
900:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
901:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
902:             _eth = _availableLimit;
903:         }
904:         
905:         
906:         if (_eth > 1000000000) 
907:         {
908:             
909:             
910:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
911:             
912:             
913:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
914:             {
915:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
916: 
917:             
918:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
919:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;  
920:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
921:                 round_[_rID].team = _team; 
922:             
923:             
924:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
925:         }
926:             
927:             
928:             if (_eth >= 100000000000000000)
929:             {
930:             airDropTracker_++;
931:             if (airdrop() == true)
932:             {
933:                 
934:                 uint256 _prize;
935:                 if (_eth >= 10000000000000000000)
936:                 {
937:                     
938:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(75)) / 100;
939:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
940:                     
941:                     
942:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
943:                     
944:                     
945:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
946:                 } else if (_eth >= 1000000000000000000 && _eth < 10000000000000000000) {
947:                     
948:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(50)) / 100;
949:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
950:                     
951:                     
952:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
953:                     
954:                     
955:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 200000000000000000000000000000000;
956:                 } else if (_eth >= 100000000000000000 && _eth < 1000000000000000000) {
957:                     
958:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(25)) / 100;
959:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
960:                     
961:                     
962:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
963:                     
964:                     
965:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
966:                 }
967:                 
968:                 _eventData_.compressedData += 10000000000000000000000000000000;
969:                 
970:                 _eventData_.compressedData += _prize * 1000000000000000000000000000000000;
971:                 
972:                 
973:                 airDropTracker_ = 0;
974:             }
975:         }
976:     
977:             
978:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (airDropTracker_ * 1000);
979:             
980:             
981:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
982:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
983:             
984:             
985:             round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
986:             round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
987:             rndTmEth_[_rID][_team] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][_team]);
988:     
989:             
990:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, _team, _eventData_);
991:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _team, _keys, _eventData_);
992:             
993:             
994: 		    endTx(_pID, _team, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
995:         }
996:     }

1171:     function endRound(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1172:         private
1173:         returns (F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1174:     {
1175:         
1176:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1177:         
1178:         
1179:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1180:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1181:         
1182:         
1183:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1184:         
1185:         
1186:         
1187:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(48)) / 100;
1188:         uint256 _com = (_pot / 50);
1189:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1190:         uint256 _p3d = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].p3d)) / 100;
1191:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_com)).sub(_gen)).sub(_p3d);
1192:         
1193:         
1194:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1195:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1196:         if (_dust > 0)
1197:         {
1198:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1199:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1200:         }
1201:         
1202:         
1203:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1204:         
1205:         
1206:         if (!address(Jekyll_Island_Inc).call.value(_com)(bytes4(keccak256("deposit()"))))
1207:         {
1208:             
1209:             
1210:             
1211:             
1212:             
1213:             
1214:             _p3d = _p3d.add(_com);
1215:             _com = 0;
1216:         }
1217:         
1218:         
1219:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1220:         
1221:         
1222:         if (_p3d > 0)
1223:             Divies.deposit.value(_p3d)();
1224:             
1225:         
1226:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1227:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1228:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1229:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1230:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1231:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1232:         _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d;
1233:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1234:         
1235:         
1236:         rID_++;
1237:         _rID++;
1238:         round_[_rID].strt = now;
1239:         round_[_rID].end = now.add(rndInit_).add(rndGap_);
1240:         round_[_rID].pot = _res;
1241:         
1242:         return(_eventData_);
1243:     }

1273:             _newTime = (((_keys) / (1000000000000000000)).mul(rndInc_)).add(_now);

1275:             _newTime = (((_keys) / (1000000000000000000)).mul(rndInc_)).add(round_[_rID].end);

1289:     function airdrop()
1290:         private 
1291:         view 
1292:         returns(bool)
1293:     {
1294:         uint256 seed = uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(
1295:             
1296:             (block.timestamp).add
1297:             (block.difficulty).add
1298:             ((uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(block.coinbase)))) / (now)).add
1299:             (block.gaslimit).add
1300:             ((uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender)))) / (now)).add
1301:             (block.number)
1302:             
1303:         )));
1304:         if((seed - ((seed / 1000) * 1000)) < airDropTracker_)
1305:             return(true);
1306:         else
1307:             return(false);

1313:     function distributeExternal(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1314:         private
1315:         returns(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1316:     {
1317:         
1318:         uint256 _com = _eth / 50;
1319:         uint256 _p3d;
1320:         if (!address(Jekyll_Island_Inc).call.value(_com)(bytes4(keccak256("deposit()"))))
1321:         {
1322:             
1323:             
1324:             
1325:             
1326:             
1327:             
1328:             _p3d = _com;
1329:             _com = 0;
1330:         }
1331:         
1332:         
1333:         uint256 _long = _eth / 100;
1334:         otherF3D_.potSwap.value(_long)();
1335:         
1336:         
1337:         uint256 _aff = _eth / 10;
1338:         
1339:         
1340:         
1341:         if (_affID != _pID && plyr_[_affID].name != '') {
1342:             plyr_[_affID].aff = _aff.add(plyr_[_affID].aff);
1343:             emit F3Devents.onAffiliatePayout(_affID, plyr_[_affID].addr, plyr_[_affID].name, _rID, _pID, _aff, now);
1344:         } else {
1345:             _p3d = _aff;
1346:         }
1347:         
1348:         
1349:         _p3d = _p3d.add((_eth.mul(fees_[_team].p3d)) / (100));
1350:         if (_p3d > 0)
1351:         {
1352:             
1353:             Divies.deposit.value(_p3d)();
1354:             
1355:             
1356:             _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d.add(_eventData_.P3DAmount);
1357:         }
1358:         
1359:         return(_eventData_);

1363:         external
1364:         payable

1366:

1368:

1376:     function distributeInternal(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _team, uint256 _keys, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1377:         private
1378:         returns(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1379:     {
1380:         
1381:         uint256 _gen = (_eth.mul(fees_[_team].gen)) / 100;
1382:         
1383:         
1384:         uint256 _air = (_eth / 100);
1385:         airDropPot_ = airDropPot_.add(_air);
1386:         
1387:         
1388:         _eth = _eth.sub(((_eth.mul(14)) / 100).add((_eth.mul(fees_[_team].p3d)) / 100));
1389:         
1390:         
1391:         uint256 _pot = _eth.sub(_gen);
1392:         
1393:         
1394:         
1395:         uint256 _dust = updateMasks(_rID, _pID, _gen, _keys);

1756:     function nameFilter(string _input)
1757:         internal
1758:         pure
1759:         returns(bytes32)
1760:     {
1761:         bytes memory _temp = bytes(_input);
1762:         uint256 _length = _temp.length;
1763:         
1764:         
1765:         require (_length <= 32 && _length > 0, "string must be between 1 and 32 characters");
1766:         
1767:         require(_temp[0] != 0x20 && _temp[_length-1] != 0x20, "string cannot start or end with space");
1768:         
1769:         if (_temp[0] == 0x30)
1770:         {
1771:             require(_temp[1] != 0x78, "string cannot start with 0x");
1772:             require(_temp[1] != 0x58, "string cannot start with 0X");
1773:         }
1774:         
1775:         
1776:         bool _hasNonNumber;
1777:         
1778:         
1779:         for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; i++)
1780:         {
1781:             
1782:             if (_temp[i] > 0x40 && _temp[i] < 0x5b)
1783:             {
1784:                 
1785:                 _temp[i] = byte(uint(_temp[i]) + 32);
1786:                 
1787:                 
1788:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false)
1789:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1790:             } else {
1791:                 require
1792:                 (
1793:                     
1794:                     _temp[i] == 0x20 || 
1795:                     
1796:                     (_temp[i] > 0x60 && _temp[i] < 0x7b) ||
1797:                     
1798:                     (_temp[i] > 0x2f && _temp[i] < 0x3a),
1799:                     "string contains invalid characters"
1800:                 );
1801:                 
1802:                 if (_temp[i] == 0x20)
1803:                     require( _temp[i+1] != 0x20, "string cannot contain consecutive spaces");
1804:                 
1805:                 
1806:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false && (_temp[i] < 0x30 || _temp[i] > 0x39))
1807:                     _hasNonNumber = true;    
1808:             }
1809:         }
1810:         
1811:         require(_hasNonNumber == true, "string cannot be only numbers");
1812:         
1813:         bytes32 _ret;
1814:         assembly {
1815:             _ret := mload(add(_temp, 32))
1816:         }
1817:         return (_ret);
1818:     }
1819: }

1912:         else if (y==0)

830:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
831:         private
832:     {
833:         
834:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
835:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
836: 
837:         
838:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 1000000000000000000)
839:         {
840:             uint256 _availableLimit = (1000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
841:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
842:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
843:             _eth = _availableLimit;
844:         }
845: 
846:         
847:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
848:         {
849: 
850:             
851:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
852: 
853:             
854:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
855:             {
856:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
857: 
858:             
859:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
860:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
861:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
862:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
863: 
864:             
865:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
866:         }
867: 
868:             
869:             if (_eth >= 100000000000000000)
870:             {
871:             airDropTracker_++;
872:             if (airdrop() == true)
873:             {
874:                 
875:                 uint256 _prize;
876:                 if (_eth >= 10000000000000000000)
877:                 {
878:                     
879:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(75)) / 100;
880:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
881: 
882:                     
883:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
884: 
885:                     
886:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
887:                 } else if (_eth >= 1000000000000000000 && _eth < 10000000000000000000) {
888:                     
889:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(50)) / 100;
890:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
891: 
892:                     
893:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
894: 
895:                     
896:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 200000000000000000000000000000000;
897:                 } else if (_eth >= 100000000000000000 && _eth < 1000000000000000000) {
898:                     
899:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(25)) / 100;
900:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
901: 
902:                     
903:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
904: 
905:                     
906:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
907:                 }
908:                 
909:                 _eventData_.compressedData += 10000000000000000000000000000000;
910:                 
911:                 _eventData_.compressedData += _prize * 1000000000000000000000000000000000;
912: 
913:                 
914:                 airDropTracker_ = 0;
915:             }
916:         }
917: 
918:             
919:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (airDropTracker_ * 1000);
920: 
921:             
922:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
923:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
924: 
925:             
926:             round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
927:             round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
928:             rndTmEth_[_rID][_team] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][_team]);
929: 
930:             
931:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, _team, _eventData_);
932:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _team, _keys, _eventData_);
933: 
934:             
935: 		    endTx(_pID, _team, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
936:         }
937:     }

1149:

1639:     function nameFilter(string _input)
1640:         internal
1641:         pure
1642:         returns(bytes32)
1643:     {
1644:         bytes memory _temp = bytes(_input);
1645:         uint256 _length = _temp.length;
1646: 
1647:         
1648:         require (_length <= 32 && _length > 0, "string must be between 1 and 32 characters");
1649:         
1650:         require(_temp[0] != 0x20 && _temp[_length-1] != 0x20, "string cannot start or end with space");
1651:         
1652:         if (_temp[0] == 0x30)
1653:         {
1654:             require(_temp[1] != 0x78, "string cannot start with 0x");
1655:             require(_temp[1] != 0x58, "string cannot start with 0X");
1656:         }
1657: 
1658:         
1659:         bool _hasNonNumber;
1660: 
1661:         
1662:         for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; i++)
1663:         {
1664:             
1665:             if (_temp[i] > 0x40 && _temp[i] < 0x5b)
1666:             {
1667:                 
1668:                 _temp[i] = byte(uint(_temp[i]) + 32);
1669: 
1670:                 
1671:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false)
1672:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1673:             } else {
1674:                 require
1675:                 (
1676:                     
1677:                     _temp[i] == 0x20 ||
1678:                     
1679:                     (_temp[i] > 0x60 && _temp[i] < 0x7b) ||
1680:                     
1681:                     (_temp[i] > 0x2f && _temp[i] < 0x3a),
1682:                     "string contains invalid characters"
1683:                 );
1684:                 
1685:                 if (_temp[i] == 0x20)
1686:                     require( _temp[i+1] != 0x20, "string cannot contain consecutive spaces");
1687: 
1688:                 
1689:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false && (_temp[i] < 0x30 || _temp[i] > 0x39))
1690:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1691:             }
1692:         }
1693: 
1694:         require(_hasNonNumber == true, "string cannot be only numbers");
1695: 
1696:         bytes32 _ret;
1697:         assembly {
1698:             _ret := mload(add(_temp, 32))
1699:         }
1700:         return (_ret);
1701:     }
1702: }

405:

407: 
408:

413:             _eth = withdrawEarnings(_pID);

421:             _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + _pID;
422: 
423:

425:             (
426:                 msg.sender,

438:

441:             
442:             _eth = withdrawEarnings(_pID);
443: 
444:

447: 
448:             
449:             emit F3Devents.onWithdraw(_pID, msg.sender, plyr_[_pID].name, _eth, _now);

597:             {
598:                 return
599:                 (

601:                     (plyr_[_pID].gen).add(  getPlayerVaultsHelper(_pID, _rID).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].mask)   ),
602:                     plyr_[_pID].aff

605:             } else {
606:                 return
607:                 (

609:                     (plyr_[_pID].gen).add(  getPlayerVaultsHelper(_pID, _rID).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].mask)  ),
610:                     plyr_[_pID].aff
611:                 );
612:             }
613: 
614:         
615:         } else {
616:             return
617:             (
618:                 plyr_[_pID].win,
619:                 (plyr_[_pID].gen).add(calcUnMaskedEarnings(_pID, plyr_[_pID].lrnd)),
620:                 plyr_[_pID].aff
621:             );
622:         }

833:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
834:         private
835:     {
836:         
837:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
838:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
839: 
840:         
841:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 2100000000000000000)
842:         {
843:             uint256 _availableLimit = (2100000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
844:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
845:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
846:             _eth = _availableLimit;
847:         }
848: 
849:         
850:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
851:         {
852: 
853:             
854:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
855: 
856:             
857:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
858:             {
859:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
860: 
861:             
862:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
863:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
864:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
865:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
866: 
867:             
868:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
869:         }
870: 
871:             
872:             if (_eth >= 100000000000000000)
873:             {
874:             airDropTracker_++;
875:             if (airdrop() == true)
876:             {
877:                 
878:                 uint256 _prize;
879:                 if (_eth >= 10000000000000000000)
880:                 {
881:                     
882:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(75)) / 100;
883:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
884: 
885:                     
886:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
887: 
888:                     
889:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
890:                 } else if (_eth >= 1000000000000000000 && _eth < 10000000000000000000) {
891:                     
892:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(50)) / 100;
893:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
894: 
895:                     
896:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
897: 
898:                     
899:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 200000000000000000000000000000000;
900:                 } else if (_eth >= 100000000000000000 && _eth < 1000000000000000000) {
901:                     
902:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(25)) / 100;
903:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
904:

915: 
916:

918:             }

920: 
921:

924:

1115:     function endRound(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1116:         private
1117:         returns (F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1118:     {
1119:         
1120:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1121: 
1122:         
1123:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1124:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1125: 
1126:         
1127:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1128: 
1129:         
1130:         
1131:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(48)) / 100; 
1132:         uint256 _com = (_pot / 50); 
1133:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1134:         uint256 _p3d = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].p3d)) / 100;
1135:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_com)).sub(_gen)).sub(_p3d);
1136: 
1137:         
1138:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1139:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1140:         if (_dust > 0)
1141:         {
1142:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1143:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1144:         }
1145: 
1146:         
1147:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1148: 
1149:         
1150: 
1151:         admin.transfer(_com);
1152: 
1153:         admin.transfer(_p3d.sub(_p3d / 2));
1154: 
1155:         round_[_rID].pot = _pot.add(_p3d / 2);
1156: 
1157:         
1158:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1159: 
1160:         
1161:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1162:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1163:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1164:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1165:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1166:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1167:         _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d;
1168:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1169: 
1170:         
1171:         rID_++;
1172:         _rID++;
1173:         round_[_rID].strt = now;
1174:         round_[_rID].end = now.add(rndInit_).add(rndGap_);
1175:         round_[_rID].pot = _res;
1176: 
1177:         return(_eventData_);
1178:     }

830:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
831:         private
832:     {
833:         
834:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
835:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
836: 
837:         
838:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 1000000000000000000)
839:         {
840:             uint256 _availableLimit = (1000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
841:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
842:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
843:             _eth = _availableLimit;
844:         }
845: 
846:         
847:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
848:         {
849: 
850:             
851:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
852: 
853:             
854:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
855:             {
856:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
857: 
858:             
859:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
860:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
861:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
862:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
863: 
864:             
865:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
866:         }
867: 
868:             
869:             if (_eth >= 100000000000000000)
870:             {
871:             airDropTracker_++;
872:             if (airdrop() == true)
873:             {
874:                 
875:                 uint256 _prize;
876:                 if (_eth >= 10000000000000000000)
877:                 {
878:                     
879:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(75)) / 100;
880:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
881: 
882:                     
883:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
884: 
885:                     
886:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
887:                 } else if (_eth >= 1000000000000000000 && _eth < 10000000000000000000) {
888:                     
889:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(50)) / 100;
890:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
891: 
892:                     
893:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
894: 
895:                     
896:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 200000000000000000000000000000000;
897:                 } else if (_eth >= 100000000000000000 && _eth < 1000000000000000000) {
898:                     
899:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(25)) / 100;
900:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
901: 
902:                     
903:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
904: 
905:                     
906:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
907:                 }
908:                 
909:                 _eventData_.compressedData += 10000000000000000000000000000000;
910:                 
911:                 _eventData_.compressedData += _prize * 1000000000000000000000000000000000;
912: 
913:                 
914:                 airDropTracker_ = 0;
915:             }
916:         }
917: 
918:             
919:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (airDropTracker_ * 1000);
920: 
921:             
922:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
923:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
924: 
925:             
926:             round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
927:             round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
928:             rndTmEth_[_rID][_team] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][_team]);
929: 
930:             
931:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, _team, _eventData_);
932:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _team, _keys, _eventData_);
933: 
934:             
935: 		    endTx(_pID, _team, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
936:         }
937:     }

1112:     function endRound(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1113:         private
1114:         returns (F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1115:     {
1116:         
1117:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1118: 
1119:         
1120:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1121:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1122: 
1123:         
1124:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1125: 
1126:         
1127:         
1128:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(48)) / 100;
1129:         uint256 _com = (_pot / 50);
1130:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1131:         uint256 _p3d = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].p3d)) / 100;
1132:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_com)).sub(_gen)).sub(_p3d);
1133: 
1134:         
1135:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1136:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1137:         if (_dust > 0)
1138:         {
1139:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1140:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1141:         }
1142: 
1143:         
1144:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1145: 
1146:         
1147:         _com = _com.add(_p3d.sub(_p3d / 2));
1148:         admin.transfer(_com);
1149: 
1150:         _res = _res.add(_p3d / 2);
1151: 
1152:         
1153:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1154: 
1155:         
1156:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1157:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1158:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1159:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1160:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1161:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1162:         _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d;
1163:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1164: 
1165:         
1166:         rID_++;
1167:         _rID++;
1168:         round_[_rID].strt = now;
1169:         round_[_rID].end = now.add(rndInit_).add(rndGap_);
1170:         round_[_rID].pot = _res;
1171: 
1172:         return(_eventData_);
1173:     }

1205:             _newTime = (((_keys) / (1000000000000000000)).mul(rndInc_)).add(round_[_rID].end);

1220:         private
1221:         view

1224:         uint256 seed = uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(
1225:

1227:             (block.difficulty).add
1228:             ((uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(block.coinbase)))) / (now)).add
1229:             (block.gaslimit).add
1230:             ((uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender)))) / (now)).add
1231:             (block.number)
1232:

1245:         returns(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1246:     {
1247:         
1248:         uint256 _p1 = _eth / 100;
1249:         uint256 _com = _eth / 50;
1250:         _com = _com.add(_p1);
1251: 
1252:         uint256 _p3d;
1253:         if (!address(admin).call.value(_com)())
1254:         {
1255:             
1256:             
1257:             
1258:             
1259:             
1260:             
1261:             _p3d = _com;
1262:             _com = 0;

1266:         
1267:         uint256 _aff = _eth / 10;
1268: 
1269:         
1270:         
1271:         if (_affID != _pID && plyr_[_affID].name != '') {
1272:             plyr_[_affID].aff = _aff.add(plyr_[_affID].aff);
1273:             emit F3Devents.onAffiliatePayout(_affID, plyr_[_affID].addr, plyr_[_affID].name, _rID, _pID, _aff, now);
1274:         } else {
1275:             _p3d = _p3d.add(_aff);
1276:         }
1277: 
1278:         
1279:         _p3d = _p3d.add((_eth.mul(fees_[_team].p3d)) / (100));

1281:         {
1282:             
1283:             uint256 _potAmount = _p3d / 2;

1288:

1292:

1311:         private

1316:

1318:         uint256 _air = (_eth / 100);
1319:         airDropPot_ = airDropPot_.add(_air);
1320: 
1321:

1323:

1347:     function updateMasks(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _gen, uint256 _keys)
1348:         private
1349:         returns(uint256)
1350:     {
1351:         
1352: 
1353:

593:     function getBuyPrice()
594:         public 
595:         view 
596:         returns(uint256)
597:     {  
598:         
599:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
600:             
601:         
602:         uint256 _now = now;
603:         
604:         
605:         if (_now > round_[_rID].strt + rndGap_ && round_[_rID].eth != 0 && _now <= round_[_rID].end)
606:             return ( (round_[_rID].keys.add(1000000000000000000)).ethRec(1000000000000000000) );
607:         else if (_now <= round_[_rID].end) 
608:             return ( ((round_[_rID].ico.keys()).add(1000000000000000000)).ethRec(1000000000000000000) );
609:         else 
610:             return ( 100000000000000 ); 
611:     }

629:

631:         if (_now <= round_[_rID].strt + rndGap_)
632:             return( ((round_[_rID].end).sub(rndInit_)).sub(_now) );
633:         else 
634:             if (_now < round_[_rID].end)
635:                 return( (round_[_rID].end).sub(_now) );

637:                 return(0);

647:     function getPlayerVaults(uint256 _pID)
648:         public
649:         view
650:         returns(uint256 ,uint256, uint256)
651:     {
652:         
653:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
654:         
655:         
656:         if (now > round_[_rID].end && round_[_rID].ended == false)
657:         {
658:             uint256 _roundMask;
659:             uint256 _roundEth;
660:             uint256 _roundKeys;
661:             uint256 _roundPot;
662:             if (round_[_rID].eth == 0 && round_[_rID].ico > 0)
663:             {
664:                 
665:                 _roundEth = round_[_rID].ico;
666:                 
667:                 
668:                 _roundKeys = (round_[_rID].ico).keys();
669:                 
670:                 
671:                 _roundMask = ((round_[_rID].icoGen).mul(1000000000000000000)) / _roundKeys;
672:                 
673:                 
674:                 _roundPot = (round_[_rID].pot).add((round_[_rID].icoGen).sub((_roundMask.mul(_roundKeys)) / (1000000000000000000)));
675:             } else {
676:                 _roundEth = round_[_rID].eth;
677:                 _roundKeys = round_[_rID].keys;
678:                 _roundMask = round_[_rID].mask;
679:                 _roundPot = round_[_rID].pot;
680:             }
681:             
682:             uint256 _playerKeys;
683:             if (plyrRnds_[_pID][plyr_[_pID].lrnd].ico == 0)
684:                 _playerKeys = plyrRnds_[_pID][plyr_[_pID].lrnd].keys;
685:             else
686:                 _playerKeys = calcPlayerICOPhaseKeys(_pID, _rID);
687:             
688:             
689:             if (round_[_rID].plyr == _pID)
690:             {
691:                 return
692:                 (
693:                     (plyr_[_pID].win).add( (_roundPot.mul(48)) / 100 ),
694:                     (plyr_[_pID].gen).add( getPlayerVaultsHelper(_pID, _roundMask, _roundPot, _roundKeys, _playerKeys) ),
695:                     plyr_[_pID].aff
696:                 );
697:             
698:             } else {
699:                 return
700:                 (
701:                     plyr_[_pID].win,   
702:                     (plyr_[_pID].gen).add( getPlayerVaultsHelper(_pID, _roundMask, _roundPot, _roundKeys, _playerKeys) ),
703:                     plyr_[_pID].aff
704:                 );
705:             }
706:             
707:         
708:         } else {
709:             return
710:             (
711:                 plyr_[_pID].win,
712:                 (plyr_[_pID].gen).add(calcUnMaskedEarnings(_pID, plyr_[_pID].lrnd)),
713:                 plyr_[_pID].aff
714:             );
715:         }
716:     }
717:

721:     function getPlayerVaultsHelper(uint256 _pID, uint256 _roundMask, uint256 _roundPot, uint256 _roundKeys, uint256 _playerKeys)
722:         private
723:         view
724:         returns(uint256)
725:     {
726:         return(  (((_roundMask.add((((_roundPot.mul(potSplit_[round_[rID_].team].gen)) / 100).mul(1000000000000000000)) / _roundKeys)).mul(_playerKeys)) / 1000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][rID_].mask)  );
727:     }

937:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
938:         }

957:         
958:

961:         
962:

964:         
965:         
966:         round_[_rID].pot = _pot.add(round_[_rID].pot);
967:

980:     function core(uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
981:         private
982:     {
983:         
984:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
985:         
986:         
987:         if (round_[_rID].eth == 0 && round_[_rID].ico > 0)
988:             roundClaimICOKeys(_rID);
989:         
990:         
991:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].ico > 0)
992:         {
993:             
994:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = calcPlayerICOPhaseKeys(_pID, _rID);
995:             
996:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].ico = 0;
997:         }
998:             
999:         
1000:         uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
1001:         
1002:         
1003:         if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
1004:         {
1005:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
1006: 
1007:             
1008:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
1009:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;  
1010:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
1011:                 round_[_rID].team = _team; 
1012:             
1013:             
1014:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
1015:         }
1016:         
1017:         
1018:         if (_eth >= 100000000000000000)
1019:         {
1020:             airDropTracker_++;
1021:             if (airdrop() == true)
1022:             {
1023:                 
1024:                 uint256 _prize;
1025:                 if (_eth >= 10000000000000000000) 
1026:                 {
1027:                     
1028:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(75)) / 100;
1029:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
1030:                     
1031:                     
1032:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
1033:                     
1034:                     
1035:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
1036:                 } else if (_eth >= 1000000000000000000 && _eth < 10000000000000000000) {
1037:                     
1038:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(50)) / 100;
1039:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
1040:                     
1041:                     
1042:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
1043:                     
1044:                     
1045:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 200000000000000000000000000000000;
1046:                 } else if (_eth >= 100000000000000000 && _eth < 1000000000000000000) {
1047:                     
1048:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(25)) / 100;
1049:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
1050:                     
1051:                     
1052:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
1053:                     
1054:                     
1055:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 100000000000000000000000000000000;
1056:                 }
1057:                 
1058:                 _eventData_.compressedData += 10000000000000000000000000000000;
1059:                 
1060:                 _eventData_.compressedData += _prize * 1000000000000000000000000000000000;
1061:                 
1062:                 
1063:                 airDropTracker_ = 0;
1064:             }
1065:         }
1066: 
1067:         
1068:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (airDropTracker_ * 1000);
1069:         
1070:         
1071:         plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
1072:         
1073:         
1074:         round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
1075:         round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
1076:         rndTmEth_[_rID][_team] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][_team]);
1077: 
1078:         
1079:         _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, _team, _eventData_);
1080:         _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _team, _keys, _eventData_);
1081:         
1082:         
1083:         endTx(_rID, _pID, _team, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
1084:     }

1297:     function manageRoundAndPlayer(uint256 _pID, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1298:         private
1299:         returns (F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1300:     {
1301:         
1302:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1303:         
1304:         
1305:         uint256 _now = now;
1306:         
1307:         
1308:         
1309:         if (_now > round_[_rID].end)
1310:         {
1311:             
1312:             if (round_[_rID].ended == false)
1313:             {
1314:                 _eventData_ = endRound(_eventData_);
1315:                 round_[_rID].ended = true;
1316:             }
1317:             
1318:             
1319:             rID_++;
1320:             _rID++;
1321:             round_[_rID].strt = _now;
1322:             round_[_rID].end = _now.add(rndInit_).add(rndGap_);
1323:         }
1324:         
1325:         
1326:         if (plyr_[_pID].lrnd != _rID)
1327:         {
1328:             
1329:             
1330:             if (plyr_[_pID].lrnd != 0)
1331:                 updateGenVault(_pID, plyr_[_pID].lrnd);
1332:             
1333:             
1334:             plyr_[_pID].lrnd = _rID;
1335:

1346:     function endRound(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1347:         private
1348:         returns (F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1349:     {
1350:         
1351:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1352:         
1353:         
1354:         if (round_[_rID].eth == 0 && round_[_rID].ico > 0)
1355:             roundClaimICOKeys(_rID);
1356:         
1357:         
1358:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1359:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1360:         
1361:         
1362:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1363:         
1364:         
1365:         
1366:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(48)) / 100;
1367:         uint256 _com = (_pot / 50);
1368:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1369:         uint256 _p3d = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].p3d)) / 100;
1370:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_com)).sub(_gen)).sub(_p3d);
1371:         
1372:         
1373:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1374:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1375:         if (_dust > 0)
1376:         {
1377:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1378:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1379:         }
1380:         
1381:         
1382:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1383:         
1384:         
1385:         if (!address(Jekyll_Island_Inc).call.value(_com)(bytes4(keccak256("deposit()"))))
1386:         {
1387:             
1388:             
1389:             
1390:             
1391:             
1392:             
1393:             _p3d = _p3d.add(_com);
1394:             _com = 0;
1395:         }
1396:             
1397:         
1398:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1399:         
1400:         
1401:         if (_p3d > 0)
1402:             Divies.deposit.value(_p3d)();
1403:             
1404:         
1405:         round_[_rID + 1].pot += _res;
1406:         
1407:         
1408:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1409:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1410:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1411:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1412:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1413:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1414:         _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d;
1415:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1416:         
1417:         return(_eventData_);
1418:     }

1912:     
1913:     
1914:

1918:

1921: 
1922: 
1923:     function nameFilter(string _input)
1924:         internal
1925:         pure
1926:         returns(bytes32)
1927:     {
1928:         bytes memory _temp = bytes(_input);
1929:         uint256 _length = _temp.length;
1930:         
1931:         
1932:         require (_length <= 32 && _length > 0, "string must be between 1 and 32 characters");
1933:         
1934:         require(_temp[0] != 0x20 && _temp[_length-1] != 0x20, "string cannot start or end with space");
1935:         
1936:         if (_temp[0] == 0x30)
1937:         {
1938:             require(_temp[1] != 0x78, "string cannot start with 0x");
1939:             require(_temp[1] != 0x58, "string cannot start with 0X");
1940:         }
1941:         
1942:         
1943:         bool _hasNonNumber;
1944:         
1945:         
1946:         for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; i++)
1947:         {
1948:             
1949:             if (_temp[i] > 0x40 && _temp[i] < 0x5b)
1950:             {
1951:                 
1952:                 _temp[i] = byte(uint(_temp[i]) + 32);
1953:                 
1954:                 
1955:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false)
1956:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1957:             } else {
1958:                 require
1959:                 (
1960:                     
1961:                     _temp[i] == 0x20 || 
1962:                     
1963:                     (_temp[i] > 0x60 && _temp[i] < 0x7b) ||
1964:                     
1965:                     (_temp[i] > 0x2f && _temp[i] < 0x3a),
1966:                     "string contains invalid characters"
1967:                 );
1968:                 
1969:                 if (_temp[i] == 0x20)
1970:                     require( _temp[i+1] != 0x20, "string cannot contain consecutive spaces");
1971:                 
1972:                 
1973:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false && (_temp[i] < 0x30 || _temp[i] > 0x39))
1974:                     _hasNonNumber = true;    
1975:             }
1976:         }
1977:         
1978:         require(_hasNonNumber == true, "string cannot be only numbers");
1979:         
1980:         bytes32 _ret;
1981:         assembly {
1982:             _ret := mload(add(_temp, 32))
1983:         }
1984:         return (_ret);
1985:     }
1986: }

2032:         internal

2045:         internal
2046:         pure
2047:         returns (uint256 y) 
2048:     {
2049:         uint256 z = ((add(x,1)) / 2);
2050:         y = x;
2051:         while (z < y) 
2052:         {
2053:             y = z;
2054:             z = ((add((x / z),z)) / 2);
2055:         }
2056:     }

2076:     {
2077:         if (x==0)
2078:             return (0);
2079:         else if (y==0)
2080:             return (1);
2081:         else 
2082:         {
2083:             uint256 z = x;
2084:             for (uint256 i=1; i < y; i++)
2085:                 z = mul(z,x);
2086:             return (z);
2087:         }

382:     function withdraw()
383:         isActivated()
384:         isHuman()
385:         public
386:     {
387:         
388:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
389: 
390:         
391:         uint256 _now = now;
392: 
393:         
394:         uint256 _pID = pIDxAddr_[msg.sender];
395: 
396:         
397:         uint256 _eth;
398: 
399:         
400:         if (_now > round_[_rID].end && round_[_rID].ended == false && round_[_rID].plyr != 0)
401:         {
402:             
403:             F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_;
404: 
405:             
406: 			round_[_rID].ended = true;
407:             _eventData_ = endRound(_eventData_);
408: 
409: 			
410:             _eth = withdrawEarnings(_pID);
411: 
412:             
413:             if (_eth > 0)
414:                 plyr_[_pID].addr.transfer(_eth);
415: 
416:             
417:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (_now * 1000000000000000000);
418:             _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + _pID;
419: 
420:             
421:             emit F3Devents.onWithdrawAndDistribute
422:             (
423:                 msg.sender,
424:                 plyr_[_pID].name,
425:                 _eth,
426:                 _eventData_.compressedData,
427:                 _eventData_.compressedIDs,
428:                 _eventData_.winnerAddr,
429:                 _eventData_.winnerName,
430:                 _eventData_.amountWon,
431:                 _eventData_.newPot,
432:                 _eventData_.P3DAmount,
433:                 _eventData_.genAmount
434:             );
435: 
436:         
437:         } else {
438:             
439:             _eth = withdrawEarnings(_pID);
440: 
441:             
442:             if (_eth > 0)
443:                 plyr_[_pID].addr.transfer(_eth);
444: 
445:             
446:             emit F3Devents.onWithdraw(_pID, msg.sender, plyr_[_pID].name, _eth, _now);
447:         }
448:     }

581:     function getPlayerVaults(uint256 _pID)
582:         public
583:         view
584:         returns(uint256 ,uint256, uint256)
585:     {
586:         
587:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
588: 
589:         
590:         if (now > round_[_rID].end && round_[_rID].ended == false && round_[_rID].plyr != 0)
591:         {
592:             
593:             if (round_[_rID].plyr == _pID)
594:             {
595:                 return
596:                 (
597:                     (plyr_[_pID].win).add( ((round_[_rID].pot).mul(48)) / 100 ),
598:                     (plyr_[_pID].gen).add(  getPlayerVaultsHelper(_pID, _rID).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].mask)   ),
599:                     plyr_[_pID].aff
600:                 );
601:             
602:             } else {
603:                 return
604:                 (
605:                     plyr_[_pID].win,
606:                     (plyr_[_pID].gen).add(  getPlayerVaultsHelper(_pID, _rID).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].mask)  ),
607:                     plyr_[_pID].aff
608:                 );
609:             }
610: 
611:         
612:         } else {
613:             return
614:             (
615:                 plyr_[_pID].win,
616:                 (plyr_[_pID].gen).add(calcUnMaskedEarnings(_pID, plyr_[_pID].lrnd)),
617:                 plyr_[_pID].aff
618:             );
619:         }
620:     }

736:         {
737:             
738:             core(_rID, _pID, msg.value, _affID, _team, _eventData_);

830:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
831:         private
832:     {
833:         
834:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
835:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
836: 
837:         
838:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 1000000000000000000)
839:         {
840:             uint256 _availableLimit = (1000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
841:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
842:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
843:             _eth = _availableLimit;
844:         }
845: 
846:         
847:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
848:         {
849: 
850:             
851:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
852: 
853:             
854:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
855:             {
856:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
857: 
858:             
859:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
860:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
861:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
862:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
863: 
864:             
865:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
866:         }
867: 
868:             
869:             if (_eth >= 100000000000000000)
870:             {
871:             airDropTracker_++;
872:             if (airdrop() == true)
873:             {
874:                 
875:                 uint256 _prize;
876:                 if (_eth >= 10000000000000000000)
877:                 {
878:                     
879:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(75)) / 100;

1112:     function endRound(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1113:         private
1114:         returns (F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1115:     {
1116:         
1117:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1118: 
1119:         
1120:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1121:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1122: 
1123:         
1124:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1125: 
1126:         
1127:         
1128:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(48)) / 100;
1129:         uint256 _com = (_pot / 50);
1130:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1131:         uint256 _p3d = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].p3d)) / 100;
1132:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_com)).sub(_gen)).sub(_p3d);
1133: 
1134:         
1135:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1136:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1137:         if (_dust > 0)
1138:         {
1139:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1140:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1141:         }
1142: 
1143:         
1144:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1145: 
1146:         
1147:         _com = _com.add(_p3d.sub(_p3d / 2));
1148:         admin.transfer(_com);
1149: 
1150:         _res = _res.add(_p3d / 2);
1151: 
1152:         
1153:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1154: 
1155:         
1156:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1157:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1158:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1159:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1160:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1161:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1162:         _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d;
1163:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1164: 
1165:         
1166:         rID_++;
1167:         _rID++;
1168:         round_[_rID].strt = now;
1169:         round_[_rID].end = now.add(rndInit_).add(rndGap_);
1170:         round_[_rID].pot = _res;
1171: 
1172:         return(_eventData_);
1173:     }

1639:     function nameFilter(string _input)
1640:         internal
1641:         pure
1642:         returns(bytes32)
1643:     {
1644:         bytes memory _temp = bytes(_input);
1645:         uint256 _length = _temp.length;
1646: 
1647:         
1648:         require (_length <= 32 && _length > 0, "string must be between 1 and 32 characters");
1649:         
1650:         require(_temp[0] != 0x20 && _temp[_length-1] != 0x20, "string cannot start or end with space");
1651:         
1652:         if (_temp[0] == 0x30)
1653:         {
1654:             require(_temp[1] != 0x78, "string cannot start with 0x");
1655:             require(_temp[1] != 0x58, "string cannot start with 0X");
1656:         }
1657: 
1658:         
1659:         bool _hasNonNumber;
1660: 
1661:         
1662:         for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; i++)
1663:         {
1664:             
1665:             if (_temp[i] > 0x40 && _temp[i] < 0x5b)
1666:             {
1667:                 
1668:                 _temp[i] = byte(uint(_temp[i]) + 32);
1669: 
1670:                 
1671:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false)
1672:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1673:             } else {
1674:                 require
1675:                 (
1676:                     
1677:                     _temp[i] == 0x20 ||
1678:                     
1679:                     (_temp[i] > 0x60 && _temp[i] < 0x7b) ||
1680:                     
1681:                     (_temp[i] > 0x2f && _temp[i] < 0x3a),
1682:                     "string contains invalid characters"
1683:                 );
1684:                 
1685:                 if (_temp[i] == 0x20)
1686:                     require( _temp[i+1] != 0x20, "string cannot contain consecutive spaces");
1687: 
1688:                 
1689:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false && (_temp[i] < 0x30 || _temp[i] > 0x39))
1690:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1691:             }
1692:         }
1693: 
1694:         require(_hasNonNumber == true, "string cannot be only numbers");
1695: 
1696:         bytes32 _ret;
1697:         assembly {
1698:             _ret := mload(add(_temp, 32))
1699:         }
1700:         return (_ret);
1701:     }
1702: }

1720:         internal
1721:         pure
1722:         returns (uint256 c)
1723:     {
1724:         if (a == 0) {
1725:             return 0;
1726:         }

1729:         return c;

1741:         return a - b;

1748:         internal

1753:         require(c >= a, "SafeMath add failed");
1754:         return c;

1760:     function sqrt(uint256 x)
1761:         internal
1762:         pure
1763:         returns (uint256 y)
1764:     {
1765:         uint256 z = ((add(x,1)) / 2);
1766:         y = x;
1767:         while (z < y)
1768:         {
1769:             y = z;
1770:             z = ((add((x / z),z)) / 2);
1771:         }
1772:     }
1773: 
1774:     
1775: 
1776: 
1777:     function sq(uint256 x)
1778:         internal
1779:         pure
1780:         returns (uint256)
1781:     {
1782:         return (mul(x,x));
1783:     }
1784:

1788:     function pwr(uint256 x, uint256 y)
1789:         internal
1790:         pure
1791:         returns (uint256)
1792:     {
1793:         if (x==0)
1794:             return (0);
1795:         else if (y==0)
1796:             return (1);
1797:         else
1798:         {
1799:             uint256 z = x;
1800:             for (uint256 i=1; i < y; i++)
1801:                 z = mul(z,x);
1802:             return (z);
1803:         }
1804:     }

830:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
831:         private
832:     {
833:         
834:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
835:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
836: 
837:         
838:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 1000000000000000000)
839:         {
840:             uint256 _availableLimit = (1000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
841:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
842:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
843:             _eth = _availableLimit;
844:         }
845: 
846:         
847:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
848:         {
849: 
850:             
851:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
852: 
853:             
854:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
855:             {
856:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
857: 
858:             
859:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
860:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
861:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
862:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
863: 
864:             
865:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
866:         }
867: 
868:             
869:             if (_eth >= 100000000000000000)
870:             {
871:             airDropTracker_++;
872:             if (airdrop() == true)
873:             {
874:                 
875:                 uint256 _prize;
876:                 if (_eth >= 10000000000000000000)
877:                 {
878:                     
879:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(75)) / 100;
880:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
881: 
882:                     
883:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
884: 
885:                     
886:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
887:                 } else if (_eth >= 1000000000000000000 && _eth < 10000000000000000000) {
888:                     
889:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(50)) / 100;
890:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
891: 
892:                     
893:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
894: 
895:                     
896:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 200000000000000000000000000000000;
897:                 } else if (_eth >= 100000000000000000 && _eth < 1000000000000000000) {
898:                     
899:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(25)) / 100;
900:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
901: 
902:                     
903:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
904: 
905:                     
906:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
907:                 }
908:                 
909:                 _eventData_.compressedData += 10000000000000000000000000000000;
910:                 
911:                 _eventData_.compressedData += _prize * 1000000000000000000000000000000000;
912: 
913:                 
914:                 airDropTracker_ = 0;
915:             }
916:         }
917: 
918:             
919:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (airDropTracker_ * 1000);
920: 
921:             
922:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
923:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
924: 
925:             
926:             round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
927:             round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
928:             rndTmEth_[_rID][_team] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][_team]);
929: 
930:             
931:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, _team, _eventData_);
932:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _team, _keys, _eventData_);
933: 
934:             
935: 		    endTx(_pID, _team, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
936:         }
937:     }

1112:     function endRound(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1113:         private
1114:         returns (F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1115:     {
1116:         
1117:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1118: 
1119:         
1120:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1121:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1122: 
1123:         
1124:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1125: 
1126:         
1127:         
1128:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(48)) / 100;
1129:         uint256 _com = (_pot / 50);
1130:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1131:         uint256 _p3d = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].p3d)) / 100;
1132:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_com)).sub(_gen)).sub(_p3d);
1133: 
1134:         
1135:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1136:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1137:         if (_dust > 0)
1138:         {
1139:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1140:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1141:         }
1142: 
1143:         
1144:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1145: 
1146:         
1147:         _com = _com.add(_p3d.sub(_p3d / 2));
1148:         admin.transfer(_com);
1149: 
1150:         _res = _res.add(_p3d / 2);
1151: 
1152:         
1153:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1154: 
1155:         
1156:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1157:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1158:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1159:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1160:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1161:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1162:         _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d;
1163:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1164: 
1165:         
1166:         rID_++;
1167:         _rID++;
1168:         round_[_rID].strt = now;
1169:         round_[_rID].end = now.add(rndInit_).add(rndGap_);
1170:         round_[_rID].pot = _res;
1171: 
1172:         return(_eventData_);
1173:     }

1195:         private

1199: 
1200:         
1201:         uint256 _newTime;
1202:         if (_now > round_[_rID].end && round_[_rID].plyr == 0)
1203:             _newTime = (((_keys) / (1000000000000000000)).mul(rndInc_)).add(_now);
1204:         else
1205:             _newTime = (((_keys) / (1000000000000000000)).mul(rndInc_)).add(round_[_rID].end);
1206:

1208:         if (_newTime < (rndMax_).add(_now))
1209:             round_[_rID].end = _newTime;

1219:     function airdrop()
1220:         private
1221:         view
1222:         returns(bool)
1223:     {
1224:         uint256 seed = uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(
1225: 
1226:             (block.timestamp).add
1227:             (block.difficulty).add
1228:             ((uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(block.coinbase)))) / (now)).add
1229:             (block.gaslimit).add
1230:             ((uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender)))) / (now)).add
1231:             (block.number)
1232: 
1233:         )));
1234:         if((seed - ((seed / 1000) * 1000)) < airDropTracker_)
1235:             return(true);

1237:             return(false);

1639:     function nameFilter(string _input)
1640:         internal
1641:         pure
1642:         returns(bytes32)
1643:     {
1644:         bytes memory _temp = bytes(_input);
1645:         uint256 _length = _temp.length;
1646: 
1647:         
1648:         require (_length <= 32 && _length > 0, "string must be between 1 and 32 characters");
1649:         
1650:         require(_temp[0] != 0x20 && _temp[_length-1] != 0x20, "string cannot start or end with space");
1651:         
1652:         if (_temp[0] == 0x30)
1653:         {
1654:             require(_temp[1] != 0x78, "string cannot start with 0x");
1655:             require(_temp[1] != 0x58, "string cannot start with 0X");
1656:         }
1657: 
1658:         
1659:         bool _hasNonNumber;
1660: 
1661:         
1662:         for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; i++)
1663:         {
1664:             
1665:             if (_temp[i] > 0x40 && _temp[i] < 0x5b)
1666:             {
1667:                 
1668:                 _temp[i] = byte(uint(_temp[i]) + 32);
1669: 
1670:                 
1671:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false)
1672:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1673:             } else {
1674:                 require
1675:                 (
1676:                     
1677:                     _temp[i] == 0x20 ||
1678:                     
1679:                     (_temp[i] > 0x60 && _temp[i] < 0x7b) ||
1680:                     
1681:                     (_temp[i] > 0x2f && _temp[i] < 0x3a),
1682:                     "string contains invalid characters"
1683:                 );
1684:                 
1685:                 if (_temp[i] == 0x20)
1686:                     require( _temp[i+1] != 0x20, "string cannot contain consecutive spaces");
1687: 
1688:                 
1689:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false && (_temp[i] < 0x30 || _temp[i] > 0x39))
1690:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1691:             }
1692:         }
1693: 
1694:         require(_hasNonNumber == true, "string cannot be only numbers");
1695: 
1696:         bytes32 _ret;
1697:         assembly {
1698:             _ret := mload(add(_temp, 32))
1699:         }
1700:         return (_ret);

382:     function withdraw()
383:         isActivated()
384:         isHuman()
385:         public
386:     {
387:         
388:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
389: 
390:         
391:         uint256 _now = now;
392: 
393:         
394:         uint256 _pID = pIDxAddr_[msg.sender];
395: 
396:         
397:         uint256 _eth;
398: 
399:         
400:         if (_now > round_[_rID].end && round_[_rID].ended == false && round_[_rID].plyr != 0)
401:         {
402:             
403:             F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_;
404: 
405:             
406: 			round_[_rID].ended = true;
407:             _eventData_ = endRound(_eventData_);
408: 
409: 			
410:             _eth = withdrawEarnings(_pID);
411: 
412:             
413:             if (_eth > 0)
414:                 plyr_[_pID].addr.transfer(_eth);
415: 
416:             
417:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (_now * 1000000000000000000);
418:             _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + _pID;
419: 
420:             
421:             emit F3Devents.onWithdrawAndDistribute
422:             (
423:                 msg.sender,
424:                 plyr_[_pID].name,
425:                 _eth,
426:                 _eventData_.compressedData,
427:                 _eventData_.compressedIDs,
428:                 _eventData_.winnerAddr,
429:                 _eventData_.winnerName,
430:                 _eventData_.amountWon,
431:                 _eventData_.newPot,
432:                 _eventData_.P3DAmount,
433:                 _eventData_.genAmount
434:             );
435: 
436:         
437:         } else {
438:             
439:             _eth = withdrawEarnings(_pID);
440: 
441:             
442:             if (_eth > 0)
443:                 plyr_[_pID].addr.transfer(_eth);
444: 
445:             
446:             emit F3Devents.onWithdraw(_pID, msg.sender, plyr_[_pID].name, _eth, _now);
447:         }
448:     }

581:     function getPlayerVaults(uint256 _pID)
582:         public
583:         view
584:         returns(uint256 ,uint256, uint256)
585:     {
586:         
587:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
588: 
589:         
590:         if (now > round_[_rID].end && round_[_rID].ended == false && round_[_rID].plyr != 0)
591:         {
592:             
593:             if (round_[_rID].plyr == _pID)
594:             {
595:                 return
596:                 (
597:                     (plyr_[_pID].win).add( ((round_[_rID].pot).mul(48)) / 100 ),
598:                     (plyr_[_pID].gen).add(  getPlayerVaultsHelper(_pID, _rID).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].mask)   ),
599:                     plyr_[_pID].aff
600:                 );
601:             
602:             } else {
603:                 return
604:                 (
605:                     plyr_[_pID].win,
606:                     (plyr_[_pID].gen).add(  getPlayerVaultsHelper(_pID, _rID).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].mask)  ),
607:                     plyr_[_pID].aff
608:                 );
609:             }
610: 
611:         
612:         } else {
613:             return
614:             (
615:                 plyr_[_pID].win,
616:                 (plyr_[_pID].gen).add(calcUnMaskedEarnings(_pID, plyr_[_pID].lrnd)),
617:                 plyr_[_pID].aff
618:             );
619:         }
620:     }

728:

735:         if (_now > round_[_rID].strt + rndGap_ && (_now <= round_[_rID].end || (_now > round_[_rID].end && round_[_rID].plyr == 0)))
736:         {
737:             
738:             core(_rID, _pID, msg.value, _affID, _team, _eventData_);
739: 
740:         
741:         } else {
742:             
743:             if (_now > round_[_rID].end && round_[_rID].ended == false)
744:             {
745:

747:                 _eventData_ = endRound(_eventData_);

751:                 _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + _pID;

753:                 
754:                 emit F3Devents.onBuyAndDistribute
755:                 (
756:                     msg.sender,
757:                     plyr_[_pID].name,

764:                     _eventData_.newPot,

767:                 );

772:         }

830:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
831:         private
832:     {
833:         
834:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
835:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
836: 
837:         
838:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 1000000000000000000)
839:         {
840:             uint256 _availableLimit = (1000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
841:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
842:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
843:             _eth = _availableLimit;
844:         }
845: 
846:         
847:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
848:         {
849: 
850:             
851:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
852: 
853:             
854:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
855:             {
856:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
857: 
858:             
859:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
860:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
861:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
862:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
863: 
864:             
865:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
866:              }
867: 
868:

1063:     function endRound(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1064:         private
1065:         returns (F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1066:     {
1067:         
1068:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1069: 
1070:         
1071:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1072:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1073: 
1074:         
1075:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1076: 
1077:         
1078:         
1079:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(48)) / 100;
1080:         uint256 _com = (_pot / 50);
1081:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1082:         uint256 _p3d = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].p3d)) / 100;
1083:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_com)).sub(_gen)).sub(_p3d);
1084: 
1085:         
1086:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1087:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1088:         if (_dust > 0)
1089:         {
1090:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1091:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1092:         }
1093: 
1094:         
1095:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1096: 
1097:         
1098: 
1099:         admin.transfer(_com);
1100: 
1101:         admin.transfer(_p3d.sub(_p3d / 2));
1102: 
1103:         round_[_rID].pot = _pot.add(_p3d / 2);
1104: 
1105:         
1106:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1107: 
1108:         
1109:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1110:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1111:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1112:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1113:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1114:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1115:         _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d;
1116:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1117: 
1118:         
1119:         rID_++;
1120:         _rID++;
1121:         round_[_rID].strt = now;
1122:         round_[_rID].end = now.add(rndInit_).add(rndGap_);
1123:         round_[_rID].pot = _res;
1124: 
1125:         return(_eventData_);
1126:     }
